mapper.delete: DELETE FROM om_requisition_detail WHERE req_no = #{reqNo} AND org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select: SELECT , f.name AS "fmOrgName", t.name AS "toOrgName", so.name AS "orgName", oco.ebcu_name_cn AS "ownerName", occ.ebcu_name_cn AS "carrierName", suc.name AS "createBy.name", suu.name AS "updateBy.name", sua.name AS "auditBy.name" FROM om_requisition_header a LEFT JOIN sys_office f ON a.fm_org_id = f.id LEFT JOIN sys_office t ON a.to_org_id = t.id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user suc ON a.create_by = suc.id LEFT JOIN sys_user suu ON a.update_by = suu.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sua ON a.audit_by = sua.id LEFT JOIN om_customer oco ON a.owner_code = oco.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = oco.org_id LEFT JOIN om_customer occ ON a.carrier_code = occ.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = occ.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT , oi.sku_name AS "skuName" FROM om_requisition_detail a LEFT JOIN om_item oi ON a.owner_code = oi.owner_code AND a.sku_code = oi.sku_code AND a.org_id = oi.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
